official_title: A bill to make permanent the exclusion of certain services performed on fishing boats from the Federal unemployment tax.

summary.text: Amends the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 to make permanent the exemption of certain services performed on fishing boats from the Federal unemployment tax.

titles.title: A bill to make permanent the exclusion of certain services performed on fishing boats from the Federal unemployment tax.
